key.name: harvest-api-access-token
key.description: Harvest API access token for issuing requests. Must be set.

key.name: prefer-dark-theme
key.description: When true, the application will request a dark theme.

key.name: soup-logger-level
key.description: Level at which to log HTTP activity within the application.

key.name: soup-max-conns
key.description: Max number of connections to keep open in the HTTP client.

key.name: harvest-api-contact-email
key.description: Harvest API will contact this email if the API is misused in anyway. Must be set.
